item.title: InGeneralSE03E40 Around The World Special
item.description: *****Language Warning***** Greetings Loyal Listeners! Welcome to our 'InGeneral - Around The World' Special. As you know, we're all about the specials these days, however, this one requires a notice of clarification = We.Were.SMASHED! And I don't mean, we just had 'a few' drinks, I mean we were dead set shitfaced. Soooo, apologies in advance for the drunken ramblings! But we did manage to fit in the words MANUAL PENILE STIMULATION. Fascinating no? Enjoy! And thanks for being a part of our little corner of shenanigans. Wally.
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

But we did manage to fit in the words MANUAL PENILE STIMULATION. Fascinating no? Enjoy! And thanks for being a part of our little corner of shenanigans. Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 39 DVD Skeet Shooter Special For Download
item.description: ****** Language Warning***** Hey All! Yet another special for you to audibly devour, this time squarely taking aim at some of the more questionable efforts in TV and Cinema. This special could've gone for hours, luckily myself, Alex C and Todd couldn't be stuffed quite frankly as we were pretty smashed. Jokes. But enjoy anyway "InGeneral's Shitful Efforts in TV & Cinema"! Cheers, Wally.
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 38 (Porn Xmas) For Download!
item.description: *****Language Warning***** Aaaaaaaaalllriggght!! We have come together for a special presentation for you dear loyal listener. We have Vulcan mind melded our 'Something Blue' special (dumped the something borrowed) and chucked on the Christmas special as well! Hence the creation of "It's a porny porny Xmas" featuring pron reviews and childhood Christmas memories. What a combo, purity and pure filth! Enjoy, and from all of us here on the team MERRY XMAS! Wally.
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 37 (Something Old, Something New Special) For Download!
item.description: ***Language Warning*** Welcooommme baaaaaaaack! Hey listeners! As promised we are back for the first episode of our 3 special series. For those who need updating we have moved away from new episodes every 2 weeks and put a concentrated effort into specials. After all, you don't need our questionable behaviour and ill-informed talk pounding your ear drums every fortnight... Sooo, we have 3 episodes heading your way, this first one "Something Old, Something New" is a beautifully crafted mixed platter of sketches for you, old and new, mostly new of course. Next episode will be "Something Borrowed, Something Blue", a mixture of stand up and get this, a porn movie review! FINALLY! Then to cap it all off, our "Xmas Special" as always. Oh, btw- the language in this one is not edited, I repeat, blue talk is all over this episode. We've come to realise our audience know what they're in for :) Enjoy! Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 36 For Download!
item.description: Hey again loyal listeners! It's our first official 'InGeneral on Location'! This one is our little election special. We're amazingly (still) in the midst of deciding who the crap is gonna lead this big brown nation of ours, so we've gone through the parliament archives to see wat kind of parties can take us into te future and beyond, plus a few random bits and pieces... Enjoy! Wally.

Enjoy! Wally.

item.title: Ingeneral Episode 35 For Download!
item.description: Well well well! Hello again! J.B.'s final (for now) episode this time. However, as usual we have celeb news, gossip and everything you need to know to keep you up to date with 'Around the World'.... Well, the useless inbetween shite anyway :) Negman drops in for a chat amongst the mentalness as well. Enjoy! Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 34 For Download!
item.description: Howdy Y'all! Anger anger anger! It's all about the rage first up as we discuss the finer points of inconsiderate people in public, we've got near misses in vehicles and some tactics you may appreciate. We go 'Around The World' again, throw in some really.... really poor Heather Mills jokes and we unveil the new event brought to you by InGeneral Promotions. Enjoy! Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 33 For Download!
item.description: Hey All! Sorry for the delay, a few slight technical difficulties but we're all good to go! Inside this awesome to the max episode - Negman returns triumphantly once more, we launch our new dried meat franchise, we've got angry weather men and earth quake causing boobies! What more could one possibly ask for? It's the best darn comedy podcast show on this big fat web of ours! Enjoy! Cheers, Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 32 For Download!
item.description: Howdy Y'all! Apologies for last episode, but you were warned :) Soooooo, anyhoo, tonnes of the usual stuff this episode, J.B. brings some more funny commercials for us, we go 'Around the World' and Alex C (amongst other things) has an identity crisis and let's us know about the benefits of his latest insurance sca..... project. Enjoy! Cheers, Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 31 (Disturbcast & X92 Mash-Up) For Download!
item.description: Hey loyal listeners! My goodness, I have to state from the outset this episode is probably not one for the kids, not that any episode if InGeneral should ever be exposed to minors, yet, something about this episode set the tone for a story from Alex C that even I had to edit severely, seriously, you just gotta check it out to see what I mean. PLUS PLUS PLUS! I've popped a bit of a bonus on the end of this episode for you, us blokes at InGeneral work on this awesome net station called X92. I believe that it will be back up and running shortly with it's new and improved net stationy goodness. Sooo, we got our music geek hats on again and are bringing you this exclusive X92 'Re-Hash Re-Mash'. A collection of mash-ups that we've re-worked to our devious liking along with our own extra creations... Enjoy and have a Happy Easter! Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 30 For Download!
item.description: Hohhh Hohhh! We're into the dirty thirties! Although I think we were there quite a while ago. Negative Man return for our 30th, We chat Oscars (sigh) and Alex C exacts REVENGE!! SWEE SWEET REVENGE!! Not to mention around the world and various shenanigans as usual... Enjoy, Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 29 For Download!
item.description: Greetings peeps! We steady the ship for season 3 with this official episode '2'. We shoot the breeze on Olympics, Tiger (sigh) Woods, and various antics from around the worls, funnily enough in a segment titled 'Around the World'. Not to mention having a right royal whinge at the retail sector and dicuss the chances of us still having our 'mojo'. Anyhoo, it's all here in episode 29! (Well, not really, but.... metaphorically). Enjoy! Wally.
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

Enjoy! Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 28 (90's Special) For Download!
item.description: We're back for 2010 you radical dudes and dudettes! We've busted out the ripped jeans, hypercolour T-Shirts and Reebok Pumps to bring you our bloody awesome to the max 90's Special! We've got fond memories of VHS, make our way through the underbelly of 90's music talent and at some point someone mentions Woodstock '99. Not to mention all sorts of embarrassing things you tried to forget, yet weirdly, you quietly think they still rock. Oh, and I sneak a cheeky one out that gets detected despite my best efforts to keep it quiet... Enjoy! Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Christmas Special For Download!
item.description: Yule tide greetings or whatever! Welcome to the IGXS! (InGeneral Xmas Spesh) We're all about the big fella in the red suit and the beardo in the loin cloth this year as we tlak shitty gifts, violent family celebrations, what the hell is egg nog anyway and Negative man dons the beret and gives us a sensational Christmas gift with his far out beatnik bongo, it is f**king awesome to say the least! I think you'll agree he has made a triumphant return to the InGeneral airwaves. A very Merry Christmas and a safe New Year to all!! Cheers! Wally, J.B & Alex C.
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

item.title: Ingeneral Episode 26 For Download!
item.description: And here we are at Series 3 already! We kick off this new chapter in the usual laid back fashion... hey, we don't want to burn out too early..... The name on everyone's lips.... "Chap-Stick".... No, sorry Tiger Woods!! Man, hasn't he got a rep most blokes would love. Then to sum the rest of the show up nicely, you can expect Jesus on an iron, Alex cuttin loose, JB showcasing why he should be the next 'Idol' winner and I generally hang around, lookin around... and stuff. Sooooo, dear listener... Enjoy! (Or at least say you did)...

item.title: InGeneral: 'Choice Cuts - The Best of Season 2' For Download!
item.description: It took ages but it was worth it! Finally! We've scoured the last season and filtered all the B grade dodgy comedy out, and placed it straight into the 'Best of Seaon 2'. It's a roller coaster ride of emotions, personal information that you could've done without and all the bits you can't wait to hear again. You'll laugh, you'll cry (probably at the same time), you'll be driven to drink with this 1hr 35min drain of your personal time. We can't wait to get stuck into Season 3, so let's get this unnecessary heap of reminisence out of the way shall we! Cheers, Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 24 (Update & Shiteline) For Download!
item.description: HEYYYYYYYY!!! How's it goin? Sooooo, man have we been busy. Yes, we took a little break and haven't given you the latest installment for a week or so, but we have a damn good excuse! I promise! Well, it's all explained in the intro... Anyhoo, this is a little taster to keep you going before the NEXT BIG EPISODE, InGeneral: The Best of Season 2, is currently in production and coming up a treat so far! So enjoy this new 'Shiteline' we put together for you (and when I say 'put together', I mean 'fumbled our way through but had a laugh anyway') and we'll see you real soon with our latest choice cuts! Cheers, Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 23 For Download!
item.description: Alohaaaa! Well well well, episode 23, you know what that means! We're only one episode away from a pre-packaged best of Season 2! Huzzah! Soooooo, anyway, there's tonnes 'o' fun in this yeasty edition of InGeneral. We talk profit margins, gluten, nerds on power trips, fruit that makes you go 'hmmmmm', quality game jingles and we even fit in some classic TV themes for good measure. So tuck on in loyal listener, we double dare ya! Enjoy! Cheers, Wally.
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 22 For Download!
item.description: Heyyyyyyy! Good to see you again! And I'm not just saying that, you're lookin good, seriously...... you wanna hang out sometime?....No?.....Ohh...Nah, that's cool, I understand. Sooooooooooooooooo, anyhoo kids we have packed this show silly! Alex C discovers a restaurant that hits a little too close to home for one of our panel members. Sean makes a Facebook discovery that again questions the brainpower of our teenagers, we got Hitler in the boudoir, cops coppin a whiff, all the latest hard pressing issues in 'Shiteline', a sex toy that'll help save the planet, the 'Eels' contribute some tunes, plus loads more! Enjoy! Wally.
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 21 (The B-Sides) For Download!
item.description: Greetings and Salutations! How's it goin? Really?.. Hmmm, that's too bad, a bit of cream will clear that right up... Anyhoooo, welcome to our first little B-Sides episode! We have so much material left over every episode that I thought I'd do a 'MacGyver' and just grab a bunch of random shit and try and make something cool out of it. I'll let you be the judge! We've got dogs on trains, bird watchers gettin randy, criminal poetry plus myself & Alex C abuse J.B's insane knowledge of who invented what. Not to mention I've thrown in some fantastic Robin Williams in England stand up for your enjoyment as well as our latest travel segment. Enjoy! Cheers, Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 20 For Download!
item.description: As you all sit and watch in horror as Miley Cyrus attempts a pole dance and think 'Well, her real name is Destiny Hope Cyrus, so famous or not, that girl was ending up on the pole at the age of 16 anyway - Us here at InGeneral have churned out another little chapter to add to our already questionable collection of random jibberish. Negative man returns - JB, Alex C and myself discuss the finer points getting busted with porn - Shiteline hits the big issues again & our new social networking site for the inebriated goes live! Enjoy! Cheers, Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 19 For Download!
item.description: Wassssuuuuuuuuupppp!....etc. So anyway, after bludgeoning your ears with over an hour of InGeneral 'Best Of' stuff last episode, we thought we'd pump out a nice short one this week. JB is moving house, so Sean took over the buttons and rocked them hard... in his own unprepared style. We discover Alex C's penchant for getting his kit off for the neighbours, every school boy's fantasy has nearly come to life for Sean, Negative Man makes a triumphantly pessimistic return and InGeneral TV remains on the front foot of cutting edge television. Enjoy! Cheers, Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 18 'Choice Cuts - Season 1' For Download!
item.description: 'Woooooh! We're legal baby! Owwwwwww!........ Anyway... The best bits (and I use the term loosely) of Season 1 is here for your dining pleasure. There's so much on the platter that it's gonna take longer than a 'Lord Of The Rings' film duration to list everything. Sammy J is saying 'Sayonara Bitches', so, we thought we'd give you a nice little re-cap of our first Season and guaruntee to come back better than ever for episode 19! (not a guaruntee). Enjoy kids!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 17 For Download!
item.description: Well well well, have we got some madness for you... Let me summarise by saying that not only do we have a real female girl on the show talking about 'manscaping' but we also get a rather terrifying look into the private life of Alex C. JB has a side splitting story about a schnitzel but ufortunately it is eclipsed by someone's mobile phone going off in the studio and we launch our new men's fragrance... Plus music from Regurgitator... So... get stuck into it ya maniac!

item.title: InGeneral - Quick Plug For Download!
item.description: Hey There! Me again, hey here's a quick announcement for our listeners in Australia, check this out if ya wanna head to an awesome rock gig that'll rip ya face off! Cheers, Wally.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 16 (Special Presentation) For Download!
item.description: Hey Hey! Well, as the world is hit with big news everywhere, we here at InGeneral pay our respects to a beloved, inspiring and unforgettable music icon... Michael Jackson. on the other hand, we're soldiering on to bring you some entertainment to cheer you up. Well, I use the term 'entertainment' loosely as most of the show revolves around porm movie jokes, knife commercial jingles, iPhones and animals in places they shouldn't be. Yes, believe it or not, all that and more is ready and waiting for you right here on InGeneral!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 15 For Download!
item.description: Insanely witty commentary, hilarious shenanigans & quality personalities...all the hallmark's of a brilliant podcast and attributes we hope to achieve someday. In the meantime, loyal listener, please be our guest and tuck in to this latest offering of InGeneral. There's public toilet sex etiquette, swear words, sound effects, mobile phone greetings, a rather impolite children's toy and Vatican Radio goes commercial. All that plus Negative Man, Newsdesk & rock royalty in the form of Green Day! Voilah!

In the meantime, loyal listener, please be our guest and tuck in to this latest offering of InGeneral. There's public toilet sex etiquette, swear words, sound effects, mobile phone greetings, a rather impolite children's toy and Vatican Radio goes commercial. All that plus Negative Man, Newsdesk & rock royalty in the form of Green Day! Voilah!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 14 For Download!
item.description: Bonjour!... (Thought I'd give myself a little class in this episodes blurb... I think it went well...) Soooo, Episode 14 eh? 14, it's a great number, it looks good, it's double the number 7 which is incidentally the amount of Police Academy movies that have been made. My favourite being 'City Under Siege', where that bloke who does the sound effects pretends to be a robot and the crook totally falls for it and the blokes all like "bizzzzt...shooooooshzzzt....beep beep.." and the crook's all like "Wha heyyy! Runnnn!" Heheheh....classic. Anyhoo, Ep 14 is rockin' out like a drunk uncle at a wedding, Negative Man is back, and this time.. it's not positive for a change. Newsdesk returns tackling the big issues, high quality tunes from 'Tony Flow and the Miraculously Majestic Masters of Mayhem' (chili pepper fans will appreciate the reference) and Josh Pyke. Plus of course, myself, Sammy J, Alex C, Sean & JB return for some more tooling around... Get it into ya!
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 13 For Download!
item.description: (cue in dramatic music here... Maybe an evil laugh too...) Hey Kids! Oooooh, Episode 13! Scary...... and stuff. Anyhoo, we here at the InGeneral offices feel it's time for a change... a change we can believe in... I got that from this guy I know over in America, reckons he was going to run for President or something... wonder how he went, he hasn't called or anything, oh well, good luck to him. Sooooo, we were thinking that 12 episodes is as good a number as any to round off a first series. So, this episode we're gonna give you a little break from the norm and churn out a bonus episode. We're also thinking, if you lot like it then we'll make it a regular thing. Myself and Sammy J caught up with the other serial offenders that pop into the show from time to time; J.B., Alex C & Sean(all over) and basically waffled on for a while.... yep, that's it... we reeealy extended ourselves this time. Enjoy!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 12 For Download!
item.description: Hohh hohh! Finally! Episode 12 is here. After a short delay due to a brief screening for swine flu, we've served up this latest installment from behind face masks. Not that the result at the doctors turned out positive, we just think they look cool (he did however find some questionable spots, but the cream should clear those right up.....what... I meant acne...get your mind out of the gutter, c'mon we're not "that" kind of show). Sneezed up for your enjoyment this episode is some brilliant live stand-up from the shudderingly talented Dave Chappelle. Negative Man instructs us on the delicate art of 'talking the freak talk'. Our new finance segment helps put your mind at ease. Newsdesk goes undercover plus melodic assistance from the 'Red Hot Chili Peppers' & 'Catatonia' ensure this episode is nicely rounded off... Well, hook in then!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 11 For Download!
item.description: Howdy! This episode is packed to the proverbial rafters! We feature comedy tracks from 'The Lonely Island's new album 'Incredibad' (hilarious). Negative man lives up to his namesake again with his latest update. Our national security ad campaign kicks off. 'NewsDesk' Keeps you informed on all the important stories and nothing but the best aussie talent in music this week, 'Gerling' & 'Eskimo Joe' ensure the toes will indeed tap. Enjoy!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 10 For Download!
item.description: Double digits baby! Wooh! And I'm not talking about that full body cavity search the policeman gave me last week...Boom! We're at episode 10. Our 'Super Bumper Issue'. Nearly 50 minutes of great music, giggles, interviews and general foolish behaviour. Ya can't go wrong. Music from the ethereal Coldplay, Negative man is back...and this time it's personal. Our huge (and I do mean huge...it goes for 20 minutes) interview with amazing Aussie comedian Claire Hooper. MGF rolls out a tune. Music moments in history educates you on what goes on behind the scenes of some big acts & Live stand up from Ed Byrne. Brilliant. Enjoy!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 9 For Download!
item.description: Heyyyyyyyy, Here it is, episode 9 of InGeneral 12 hours late as promised....... Anyhoo, this episode has got quite the selection for ya! Thanks to A-List Entertainment we have live stand-up from 'Tahir'. We chat to Andrew 'Bing' Robilliard from Aussie band 'BJ Lloyd & The Cold December'. Our new sports segment gets a run. More in-depth reporting from the NewsDesk plus great music from 'The Vines' & 'Tripod'. Enjoy!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 8 For Download!
item.description: Aaaaaaaaand here it is! Episode 8 of InGeneral; Angelina's gonna want to adopt it, Paris will want to stuff it into her handbag and Nick Nolte will want to get his next mug shot taken with it...So much coming up on the show, thanks to A-List Entertainment we have Live Stand-Up from Carl Barron, classic comedy from Sam Kinison, Corky and the Juice Pigs, Newsdesk hits the streets, Negative Man is back with a vengeance, we debut our new soap opera and of course, fantastic tunes from new Aussie group 'B.J. Lloyd & The Cold December' and 'Lily Allen'... Go go go! What are you waiting for!

Lloyd & The Cold December' and 'Lily Allen'... Go go go! What are you waiting for!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 7 For Download!
item.description: Finally!! Sorry we're a day late... There was some rather inconvenient technical issues yesterday (which means that the button Wally pushes on the thing, didn't talk to the other thing and wouldn't let him upload the episode to the whatchamacallit) Anyhoo, here is episode 7 just for you. Bit of an American feel in this show as we chuck on some of the U.S's finest comedians - Jerry Seinfeld, Bob Newhart & Adam Sandler. We check in with Negative Man & try our hand at the highly lucrative credit card business, not to mention of course, fantastic music, this week with Neil Finn & Spiderbait. Now get stuck into it ya scallywag!
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 6 For Download!
item.description: Well, here it is kids! Episode 6 served up for your comedy dining pleasure. We start with an entree of live stand up from an Aussie legend garnished with more of the latest stories form the Newsdesk. Our main course will tickle the tastebuds as 'Negative Man' graces us with his presence, topped with a generous serving of a Monty Python classic along with 30 seconds of what can only be described as Sammy J gold. Desert consists of a delectable comedy gig guide and we launch our new day spa business. To finish, we give you an after dinner treat with your coffee in the form of top tunes from The Kooks and The John Butler Trio...Enjoy your meal.
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 5 For Download!
item.description: Episode 5 has been polished, buffed and bronzed just for you this week, and you couldn't fit a smartie into this one it is that packed! Feature comedy tracks from Flight of the Conchords, InGeneral TV's summer line up is announced, more live comedy form Akmal Saleh, 'Negative Man' makes his debut and brilliant tunes from Powderfinger & Saint Etienne. Enjoy the show! Or at least pretend you did.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 4 For Download!
item.description: My friends... or if I may... ladies and gentlemen. I present to you, Episode 4 for your listening pleasure...hmm that's pretty presumptuous of me, going by our track record I should say, I present to you 37 minutes of your life you will never get back. Have we got a show for you! Live stand up from one of the world's best; Arj Barker. Feature comedy tracks from Aussie trio - Tripod. We flashback to a comedy classic, I try my hand at street reporting plus tunes from Eskimo Joe & Spiderbait! Get it into ya!

item.title: InGeneral Episode 3 (For Download)
item.description: Wow, have we got Episode 3 chocked to the rafters or what! More comedy gold in the form of one of the world's best comedians; Carl Barron, funny tunes from the one and only Weird Al, we take you into a rather off-putting counselling session, be sure to tune into our interview with Monopoly Champion Geoff Masters (how cool is that.. Monopoly!!), InGeneral TV delivers yet another ratings winner and we chuck in some quality music for good measure...

item.title: InGeneral Episode 2 (For Download)
item.description: Well, who'da thunk it? Back for Episode 2 eh? Strap yourself in for some high end fart gags and rather dandy selection of music and a bit of immature capering thrown in...
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.

item.title: InGeneral Episode 1 for Download!
item.description: We kick off proceedings with some quality comedy, tunes, live stand up from one of Australia's finest, we go antiquing and launch our new pizza restaurant as well as filling you in on where to see some great comedy acts this week...
item.dc:creator: Wally, Alex C & Todd.
